net.sourceforge.aglets.itinerary.helpers
Class BaseTaskItinerary

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.aglets.itinerary.helpers.BaseItinerary
      net.sourceforge.aglets.itinerary.helpers.BaseTaskItinerary
All Implemented Interfaces:
MobilityListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, Itinerary, SimpleItinerary, TaskItinerary
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseCircularTaskItinerary
public class BaseTaskItinerary
extends BaseItinerary
implements TaskItinerary, java.io.Serializable, MobilityListener

This class represents the base for the construction of a task-based itinerary, that is an itinerary with task associated. Use this class to build more complex task-based itinerary logics. This class keeps distinctions between DEFAULT and non-default tasks. While the default tasks (EXECUTE_ON_DEFAULT) must be executed always, indipendently from the destination, the other tasks must be associated and executed depending on the destination of the itinerary. The EXECUTE_ON_DEFAULT tasks have the priority over other tasks, that means they are executed before the execution of the destination associated tasks.
Attention:
the execution policy imposes that default tasks are ALWAYS executed before task associated to a specific destination.

Version:
1.0 13-set-2005
Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire@users.sourceforge.net

serialVersionUID

See Also:
Constant Field Values

taskList

protected java.util.Hashtable taskList
This hashthable contains the task list for each destination. The key of the table is the URI string representing the destination, the value of the table is a Task[] that represent each single task that must be associated with such destination.

defaultTasks

protected java.util.Vector defaultTasks
This vector contains all default tasks that must be executed indipendently from the destination.

executeDefaultTaskOnArrival

private boolean executeDefaultTaskOnArrival
Indicates if the default tasks must be executed on the arrival to a destination.

executeDefaultTaskOnDispatch

private boolean executeDefaultTaskOnDispatch
Indicates if the default tasks must be executed on the dispatch to a destination.

executedDefaultTaskOnReverting

private boolean executedDefaultTaskOnReverting
Indicates if the default tasks must be executed on the revertering.

Constructor Detail

BaseTaskItinerary

public BaseTaskItinerary(Aglet owner)
Constructs the itinerary for the agent specified as owner. The size of the data structure are fixed to 10 elements.

Parameters:
owner - the agent owner of this itinerary.
Method Detail

addDefaultTask

public final boolean addDefaultTask(Task toExecute)
Adds a default task to the itinerary. A default task is executed on each destination of the itinerary, only on arrival of an agent. Please note that the task will not be added to the list if it is already contained.

Specified by:
addDefaultTask in interface TaskItinerary
Parameters:
toExecute - the task to execute on the arrival event
Returns:
true if the task has been added to the task list, false otherwise

removeDefaultTask

public final boolean removeDefaultTask(Task toExecute)
Removes a default task from the default task set.

Specified by:
removeDefaultTask in interface TaskItinerary
Parameters:
toExecute - the task to be removed
Returns:
true if the task is removed, false otherwise (e.g., the task is not contained in the list).

addTaskToDestination

protected final boolean addTaskToDestination(java.lang.String destinationURI,
                                             Task toExecute)
A service method used to add a task to the task list. This method checks if the task is a default task, in such case it adds the task to the default task list. Otherwise, it extract the array of tasks into the hashtable for such destination and adds the new task (append it) to the array.

Parameters:
destinationURI - the destination the task must be associated with.
toExecute - the task to add for the above destination.
Returns:
true if the task is added, false otherwise.

removeTaskFromDestination

protected boolean removeTaskFromDestination(java.lang.String destinationURI,
                                            Task toExecute)
A service method exploited to remove a task from the task array associated to a destination. The method checks if the task is a default one, in such case the task is removed from the task list of default tasks. Otherwise the task is removed from the destination list.

Parameters:
destinationURI - the destination from which the task must be removed.
toExecute - the task to remove.
Returns:
true if the task has been removed, false otherwise.
